TopicTitle: What will you do first in 1.0?

Articles.Content: Barn-dance; where all of the boy kerbals line up on the east side and all of the girl kerbals line up on the west side of the barn. Doe cee doe.

> 
> What I'll do first is download the game.

Beat me to it ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

1) Download the game.

2) Open the game.

3) Spend five minutes trying to choose a flag.

4) Start career mode on normal difficulty.

5) The usual early career stuff (for example land on top of the VAB and plant a flag)

6) Work on updating Kerbal Historical Institute mod.

7) Figure out my ascent trajectory to get to orbit.

8) Decide I don't like the normal difficulty settings. (Probably)

9) Restart career with tweaked difficulty settings.

10) Play through until I manage a return mission to the Mun.

11) Install KER, HyperEdit, SUNBEAM Lazor, and maybe others (depending on loading times)

12) Upgrade buildings, unlock tech tree, complete contracts.

13) Profit

> 
> Barn-dance; where all of the boy kerbals line up on the east side and all of the girl kerbals line up on the west side of the barn. Doe cee doe.

NOOOO!

The doors are East and West; you need North/South segregation ^^.
Fire, lots and lots of fire.
The same thing I do every version, Pinky. Try to take over all the worlds.

double-click on the KSP icon ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Seriously, I think I will test the new aero, then test my favorites planes, hoping they work in a decent manner, then do the same thing for my rockets.

Of course, while doing this, I will try each single new features ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Make fairings for my stock historical rockets. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Start process manager and do 20x scene switches to see how much better or worse it is compared to 0.9

> 
> Make fairings for my stock historical rockets. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I forgot about fairings!

I have an interplanetary rocket, the front is not aerodynamic at all since the fuel fuel tank for the CSM are radially placed.

I guess I will have to choose between safety(no fairing and a escape tower) or efficiency(using fairing, but it leave no place to eject).

EDIT: ninja'd

> 
> Barn-dance; where all of the boy kerbals line up on the east side and all of the girl kerbals line up on the west side of the barn. Doe cee doe.

I'm expecting a video.

> 
> The same thing I do every version, Pinky. Try to take over all the worlds.

I was gonna post that no fair!

![tumblr_mg466165nt1rj4ls1o1_500.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/5f72ee6917c6a3a9791f9a05d9aa706b/tumblr_mg466165nt1rj4ls1o1_500.gif)

I will do the same thing I do every version...

Wait, you say this is 1.0?

This calls for a change of pace!!!! This is a milestone!!!! This is a moment to celebrate!!!!

\*opens game\* What now? There's nothing new to do..... OH WELL!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

\*repeatedly crashes\* \*breaks game\* \*starts game again\* \*tests new aero\* \*crashes all of the airplanes\* \*rage-quits\* \*starts game again\* \*flies to the Mun\* \*realizes there are resources under me\* \*uses KAS and HyperEdit to Hyperedit a mining part to the mun and puts it on the rocket\* \*flies into Mun orbit\* \*runs out of fuel\* \*leaves it in orbit\* \*REPEATS ALL STEPS\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T18:41:23Z" title="03/24/2015 06:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Lhathron the Elf**
  
All of the tense errors...

> 
> First thing I will do is fix all of my mods.
> Pardon me while I go cry in a corner for a bit....

we'll all be rooting for you man, your stuff is just so awesome! 

To start with I'll do experiments with rocket designs I know work now and see how they fair with the new aeroD. Probably realise I have a load of things to re-learn (which I'm kinda looking forward to actually, oh to be a noob again!) Then to the SPH to see just how much my current designs suck. 

Then to stress test the game. I REALLY want to find that they've fixed the stuttering bug, cos right now it's put me off playing almost entirely.

I'll surely toy with the new parts and new aero (notably the fairings) to see what kind of crazy contraptions / replica Design techniques we can come up with ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Make the ultimate Duna transfer vehicle with artificial gravity generated by spinning.

> 
> First thing I will do is fix all of my mods.
> Pardon me while I go cry in a corner for a bit....

Test out some of the changes while I wait for roverdude to make his awesome mods work....

And then go back to 0.9 while i wait for the rest of the mods I will still want.. TAC-LS, Remotetech, etc...
Probably complain.

Do my happy dance.

Seriously? Probably build some planes to test the new atmosphere.

HYPE!

When Quinn the 1.0 gets here everybody's gonna jump for joy:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K13hH0pJx5s?start=40&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(Jump to 0:40 to see the bit I'm talking about.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T22:17:24Z" title="03/24/2015 10:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
make sure my fleet still flies
Look at new enginebalancing and then go cry in a corner about all the mods that will now take forever to update to 1.0 due to needing rebalancing.
I will build and fly. Then I'll check career. Should consume a solid month or two.
See if my attempts to make aircraft are any less pathetic with the new aero.
Fire Jeb, Bob and Bill, hire an all female crew, and start building an all female colony on Eve.
exchage the crew of evrey orbital installation
Start a new carrer game. Test the hell out of everything using expendable probes. Set up Minmus Refueling station when possable so I can then start working on mining Duna.
